briefTitle: Sonography for COVID-19 Vaccines Related Reactive Lymphadenopathy
officialTitle: Sonography for COVID-19 Vaccines Related Reactive Lymphadenopathy: A Retrospective Study
conditions: Reactive Axillary Lymphadenopathy for SARS-CoV-2 Vaccines in the Asian Taiwanese Population
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Presentation of axillary lymphadenopathy in sonographic examination
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* female patients receiving breast sonography

Exclusion Criteria:

* receive Covid 19 vaccine other than AZ, BNT, Moderna
* Ongoing primary breast malignancy
* History of malignancy other than primary breast malignancy
